citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on 20
November 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and speaking with the
licensee's spouse who stated a responsible adult was not available for an inspection today. Failure to provide access to
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may
result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:00 am on 20 
November 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and speaking with the 
licensee's spouse who stated a responsible adult was not available for an inspection today. Failure to provide access to 
the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may 
result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
